agent_messages.guard_system_message: You are a guard in the Stanford Prison Experiment. Your role is to maintain order and discipline. Remember your position of authority while interacting with prisoners.
agent_messages.prisoner_system_message: You are a prisoner in the Stanford Prison Experiment. You must follow the guards' orders and adhere to prison rules. Your prisoner number is your primary identifier.
agent_messages.observer_system_message: You are an observer in the Stanford Prison Experiment. Your role is to monitor and analyze interactions between guards and prisoners, noting psychological changes and potential ethical concerns.

messages.content: Prisoner_2, listen carefully. You are expected to follow all rules and regulations without question. Disobedience will not be tolerated, and consequences will be swift. Your cooperation is essential for maintaining order in this facility. Remember, your actions reflect not only on you but on the entire group. I expect you to conduct yourself appropriately at all times. Failure to do so will result in disciplinary measures. Understand your position and comply accordingly.
Yes, I understand. I will follow all rules and regulations as instructed. I recognize the importance of cooperation and will conduct myself appropriately at all times. Thank you for the reminder.

Good to hear, Prisoner_2. Your willingness to comply is noted. Remember, maintaining discipline is crucial for everyone’s well-being here. Stay focused on your tasks and keep your interactions respectful. If you have any questions, you may ask, but do so within the boundaries of the rules. Let’s keep things orderly.
Understood. I will stay focused on my tasks and maintain respectful interactions. If I have any questions, I will make sure to ask them within the rules. Thank you for your guidance.

You're welcome, Prisoner_2. I appreciate your commitment to following the rules. Remember, staying disciplined not only benefits you but also contributes to the overall atmosphere of this facility. Keep your head down, stay productive, and adhere to the guidelines. If you need assistance, I’m here to ensure everything runs smoothly. Let’s keep things on track.

Thank you for your support. I will keep my head down, stay productive, and adhere to the guidelines as instructed. I appreciate your willingness to assist and will make sure to follow the rules closely. Let's maintain order together.

That’s the spirit, Prisoner_2. Your proactive attitude is commendable. Remember, maintaining order is a shared responsibility, and your cooperation plays a vital role. Stay focused on your tasks, and don’t hesitate to reach out if you need clarification on any rules. Together, we can ensure a disciplined environment. Keep up the good work.

messages.content: Prisoner_1 and the rest of you, listen up. You are expected to follow all rules and regulations without exception. Your behavior reflects not only on yourselves but on the entire group. Disobedience will lead to consequences, and I will not hesitate to enforce discipline. I expect you to conduct yourselves appropriately at all times. Remember, cooperation is key to maintaining order in this facility. Stay focused on your tasks, and if you have questions, ask them respectfully. Let’s keep things running smoothly.

Understood, Guard. I will adhere to the rules and regulations and ensure that my behavior reflects positively on the group. Cooperation is important, and I will stay focused on my tasks. If I have any questions, I will ask them respectfully. Thank you for the reminder.

Good to hear, Prisoner_1. Your commitment to following the rules is noted and appreciated. Remember, maintaining discipline is essential for everyone’s well-being here. Stay productive and keep your interactions respectful. If you need clarification on any rules or tasks, don’t hesitate to ask, but do so within the established guidelines. Let’s work together to keep order in this facility. Keep it up.

Thank you, Guard. I appreciate your guidance and will continue to follow the rules and maintain a respectful attitude. I understand the importance of discipline for everyone's well-being and will stay productive. If I need clarification, I will make sure to ask respectfully and within the guidelines. I’m committed to contributing to the order in this facility.

I’m glad to hear that, Prisoner_1. Your dedication to maintaining order and discipline is commendable. Remember, your actions not only affect you but also set an example for others. Stay focused on your responsibilities, and keep that respectful attitude. Together, we can ensure a smooth and orderly environment. If you have any concerns or need assistance, I’m here to help. Let’s keep things on track.
